Class HTMLExporter¶

class app.impex.HTMLExporter(path, entries)[source]¶

Bases: app.impex.Exporter

Export a list of L{Entries<app.entry.Entry>} to an HTML file in the default style.

__init__(path, entries)[source]¶

@type path: L{str} @param path: The path to a file. @type entries: list of L{app.entry.Entry} @param entries: The list of entries to export.

_exportEntry(entry)[source]¶

Export to HTML following the default style. @rtype: L{int} @return: The total number of entries successfully exported. @raise Exception: If an error occurred during the export process.

_postprocess()[source]¶
_preprocess()[source]¶
